onboardingSubtext: Let's get your personalized study plan set up.
subjectsSubtext: Add your subjects and their difficulty level one by one.
subjectsPlaceholder: e.g., Biology, Algebra II, World History
intensitySubtext: You can change this later in your settings.
dashboardSubtext: Ready to conquer your exams? Let's get started.
subjectIntro: Ready to dive in? Upload your material to get started.
materialPlaceholder: Or paste your course notes, text, or any study material here...
errorAddMaterialOrFile: Please add study material by uploading at least one file or pasting text.
errorGenerationFailed: Failed to generate content. This might be due to a temporary issue, incorrect input, or an invalid API key. Please try again or review your input.
rateLimitError: We're experiencing high traffic right now. Please wait a moment and try again.
summaryPlaceholder: Your study guide summary will appear here once generated.
noFlashcardsAvailable: No flashcards available for this subject yet. Generate some to get started!
regenerateFlashcardsSubtext: Generating new flashcards will replace your current set.
flashcardSessionComplete: Flashcard session complete! Your readiness score has been updated.
noQuizAvailable: No quizzes available for this subject yet. Generate some to test your knowledge!
regenerateQuizzesSubtext: Generating new quizzes will replace your current set.
aiChatSubtext: Ask me anything about your study material!
aiChatSubtextFiles: Ask me anything! I can access your text and uploaded files.
chatError: Sorry, I encountered an error. This might be due to a temporary issue or an invalid API key. Please try again.
quote1: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
quote2: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quote3: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quote4: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quote5: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
supportedFormats: Supported: PDF, DOCX, PPTX, TXT, MD, JPG, PNG
dragAndDropToAddMore: Drag more files or click to add.
plannerDescription: Let AI analyze your timetable to find the best study slots and create a personalized plan for you.
imageEditorDescription: Use text prompts to magically edit your images.
imagePromptPlaceholder: e.g., Add a retro filter, make the sky blue...
editedImagePlaceholder: Your edited image will appear here.
errorNoPrompt: Please enter a prompt to describe the edit.
plannerSubheader: Upload your timetable or enter it manually to get started.
timetablePlaceholder: Upload an image or PDF of your weekly schedule.
errorAnalysisFailed: Analysis failed. Please check the file or input and try again.
schedulePlaceholder: Your analyzed schedule will appear here. Or analyze it again if it's outdated.
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
notEnoughDataForChart: Complete at least two quizzes to see your progress chart.
quizPerformanceChartTitle: A line chart showing quiz scores over time.
profileSubtext: Manage your account, preferences, and view insights.
remindersDesc: Get notifications for upcoming exams or subjects you haven't studied.
clearAllDataDesc: This will permanently delete all your subjects, progress, and settings.
focusPlaceholder: e.g., concentrate on photosynthesis, key dates from chapter 3...
addMaterialFirst: Please add study material in the Study Guide tab first to enable generation.
noSubjectsToSave: You need to create a subject first before you can save a tip.
howWellDidYouKnow: How well did you know this?
invalidOrEmptyFile: Selected file is invalid or empty. Please choose a different file.
unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type for {{fileName}}. Please use a supported format.
unsupportedTimetableFileType: Unsupported file type for timetable: {{fileName}}. Please upload a PDF, JPG, or PNG image.
manualEntryTooLong: Manual entry is too long. Please shorten your timetable input.
pleaseUploadImageFile: Please upload a valid image file (PNG, JPEG, WEBP).
noUpcomingExams: No exams scheduled in the next 14 days.
timetableStaleMessage: Your timetable analysis is outdated. Please re-analyze your schedule for today's plan.
noEventsToday: No scheduled classes or study windows for today. Enjoy your free time or add new events!
noEventsTomorrow: No scheduled classes or study windows for tomorrow. Perfect for flexible studying or relaxation!
tooltipFullName: Enter your full name to personalize your experience.
tooltipGradeLevel: Your current age or academic grade level helps tailor content difficulty.
tooltipSchoolName: Providing your school name can help with future features like shared resources.
tooltipSubjectName: The name of the subject you are studying (e.g., Algebra, Chemistry).
tooltipExamDate: The date of your final exam for this subject. This helps prioritize study plans.
tooltipDifficulty: How challenging do you find this subject? This influences AI-generated content difficulty.
tooltipLightMode: Ideal for casual learners or those with limited study time. Focuses on key concepts.
tooltipModerateMode: A balanced approach for consistent learning. Recommended for most students.
tooltipIntenseMode: For highly motivated students or those with upcoming exams. Maximizes study output.
notificationsDenied: Notification permission denied. Please enable them in your browser settings to receive reminders.
